mapper.select: SELECT id, part_name, process_id, model_number, stock_quantity, last_ordered_at FROM part WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, part_name, process_id, model_number, stock_quantity, last_ordered_at FROM part ORDER BY id
SELECT id, part_name, process_id, model_number, stock_quantity, last_ordered_at FROM part WHERE part_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{partName}, '%') ORDER BY part_name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO part (part_name, process_id, model_number, stock_quantity, last_ordered_at) VALUES (#{partName}, #{processId}, #{modelNumber}, #{stockQuantity}, #{lastOrderedAt})
